name: LCDH Exclusivo 2011 Royal Robusto
additionalNotes:
"A La Casa Del Habano stores exclusive, the Royal Robusto has been created with the finest leaves from the Vuelta Abajo plantations, the undisputed home to the world’s best premium cigars for those habano smokers who like soft-to-mild tastes”."
